name: Воин Хинора
description: Over the world threatened. You - one of the victims after the earthquake turned to the Lord for help. While your house is being restored, you were offered to help the provinces. Something is coming ... save the land of Hinor from the coming evil!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.3 GHz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Любая 512 MB Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core I5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics:  Storage: 600 MB available space
